ComicInfo.Title: Blood Hunt; Doctor Spektor Part 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
Turok’s raid on Terminal Prison has gone according to plan – but now he must face the prison’s fiercest guard – Karkaro, a terrifying war-dinosaur bred only for battle! Now the Dinosaur Hunter becomes the hunted!
DOCTOR SPEKTOR PART 5: The story of the all-new master (and we use the term lightly) sorcerer continues… as Doc gets jumped by two of Hurgn’s goons – and meets his roommate Frankie’s new girlfriend!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Aaron Lopresti | 1 | B | Cover B | Alvaro Sarraseca | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Alvaro Sarraseca | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Aaron Lopresti | 4 |
